summary: "No" is a song by Meghan Trainor from her album Thank You. Released in 2016, it's a dance-pop song with 90s influences about saying no to unwanted advances. The song was well-received, reaching top 10 in many countries and earning platinum certifications. The music video, directed by Fatima Robinson, features energetic choreography and has been compared to 90s artists. Trainor has performed the song on various TV shows and tours.
title: No (Meghan Trainor song)
